remarks: Obtaining a closed walk (as word) by appending the first symbol to the word representing a walk.  (Contributed by AV, 28-Sep-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 20-Oct-2018.)
statement:
clwwlkbij.d $e |- D = { w e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` N ) | ( lastS ` w ) = ( w ` 0 ) } $.
clwwlkel $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y /\ N e. NN ) /\ ( P e. Word V /\ ( # ` P ) = N ) /\ ( A. i e. ( 0 ..^ ( N - 1 ) ) { ( P ` i ) , ( P ` ( i + 1 ) ) } e. ran E /\ { ( lastS ` P ) , ( P ` 0 ) } e. ran E ) ) -> ( P ++ <" ( P ` 0 ) "> ) e. D ) $.
$d E i w $.
$d N i w $.
$d P i w $.
$d V i w $.
